DOC.brief_summary: Sage tablets ( 3400 mg extract from fresh sage leaves, DER 1:17) in a once daily application over 12 treatment weeks are compared against placebo in 200 menopausal patients with ≥ 5 hot flushes daily and a Hyperhidrosis Scale score ≥ 2
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Sage Tablets Compared to Placebo in Menopausal Patients With Hot Flushes and Sweating
DOC.criteria: Menopausal since ≥ 1 year ≥ 5 hot flushes /24 hours Hyperhidrosis Scale score ≥ 2 Affections like asthma, COPD, depression, diabetes, epilepsy, hyper and hypothyreosis, malign tumours
DOC.keyword: menopause, hot flushes, hot flashes, salvia, sage, sweating
